section.p: If you want to apply basic formatting to the description text, click and follow the markdown syntax. For example:
section.codeblock:
Testing HTML output ================ Select or write a test project -----------------------------------
Make sure it contains the usual and the *less usual* content types:
- all topic types - inline, block, landscape images, with and without caption - ordered, unordered, simple lists, definition lists - tables with and without caption, headers, merged cells, landscape - all **block** and **inline** elements - all note types allowed - all languages used - hyperlinks - variables - conditions - etc.
Select the HTML pipeline --------------------------------
* Using an existing HTML transformation with a few parameters set? * Installing a custom HTML plugin. * Setting up the publication scenarios
Publish and QA --------------------
Generate the HTML output and use a checklist for the QA.
